name: Apparition (itch) (cartyrs)
description:
Content warnings: Death, Homelessness, Witchcraft, and allusions to Homophobia and Christianity. 

Programs: RPG Maker MV, Aseprite, Paint Tool SAI, Photoshop, and MS Paint.

Dev Links: Tumblr Twitter Apparition Devlog

This is the first game I've ever made, it's a submission for My First Game Jam Winter 2021! Apparition is based on a short film of the same name I wrote/directed my junior year of college. I tried to write a story to critique on "Dead Lesbian Syndrome." I hope you'll enjoy Heather and Eden's story! 

Music by Eric Matyas

Apocalyptic Tileset by Kerrigan
